item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: Remember, if you want to show/hide a group, the toggle item must be in a higher scope in the hierarchy.
item.content:encoded: Remember, if you want to show/hide a group, the toggle item must be in a higher scope in the hierarchy.
